answers.answer: That's actually not too bad.  My first was estimated to be about 5lbs at 36 weeks & was 7lbs 13oz at 41 weeks when he was born.

I am 35 weeks and 4 days,my baby is 5lbs 15 oz which is one oz away from 6lbs. My doctor estimates that by my due date he'll be 7 to 8 lbs. He's a little big idk how because I'm barely showing,it scares me. I don't have any health problems either,and I eat healthy. I guess every baby and mom are different

question: Today I'm 35+5 weeks. I had an ultrasound today and my little man measures 5lbs 2oz. I also have gestational diabetes which my doctor says is why baby is small. My question is how far along are you and what's your baby measuring?
title: Baby Measuring and how many weeks along
